inclusion.criterion: Calculated creatinine clearance (using Cockcroft-Gault equation) >= 30 mL/min
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Total bilirubin =< 1.5 x the upper limit of the normal range (ULN)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Alanine aminotransferase (ALT) and aspartate aminotransferase (AST) =< 3 x ULN
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Recent prior chemotherapy: Alkylators (e.g. melphalan, cyclophosphamide) =< 14 days prior to registration
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Prior therapy with any proteasome inhibitor other than bortezomib or carfilzomib
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of 2 prior C diff infections, the most recent just 1 month ago. Recent antibx use in the last month on prior admission.
